replies.author: 梦落老司机
replies.txt_content: 可以用公告插件也可以下载sk做一个公告的脚本

replies.author: 梦落老司机
replies.txt_content:
variables: 
        {broadcast} = 0
options:  
        text0: &b[&6公告&b]&b&l内容
        text1: &b[&6公告&b]&b&l内容
        text2: &b[&6公告&b]&c&l内容
        text3: &b[&6公告&b]&9&l内容
        text4: &b[&6公告&b]&a&l内容
every 100 seconds:
        if {broadcast} is 0:
                broadcast "{@text0}"
        if {broadcast} is 1:
                broadcast "{@text1}"
        if {broadcast} is 2:
                broadcast "{@text2}"        
        if {broadcast} is 3:
                broadcast "{@text3}"
        if {broadcast} is 4:
                broadcast "{@text4}"
        add 1 to {broadcast}
        {broadcast} is 5
        set {broadcast} to 0
